issue.title: [Rust] Customizable schema inference for CSV
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9097](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9097). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Please consider extracting infer_csv_schema function into separate module allowing customization of fields DataType inference. Currently the missing part is an inference of datetime fields.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9097?focusedCommentId=17332100) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/79
